content1.text: Melon Playground is a sandbox-style android game that was made to replace the PC version of People Playground, although it is not the same developer. Many players have been waiting for such a game on the phone for a long time, and at the end of 2021, Melon was released for Android.Unlike the full-fledged computer version, there is a slightly limited functionality, but there are mods that you can download from us and improve your gameplay by creating exciting videos for tik tok or YouTube.

Melon Playground mods are added almost every day, each of the modifications is a separate work of some player. They may belong to a specific category, such as weapons, cars or tanks, or be related to a movie, game, or cartoon character. Here you can download Melon mods via a direct link. Each modification has a description, screenshots, version and download link. In separate files there are packs that need to be unpacked and thrown into the mods folder.

Thanks to a variety of items and clothes, Watermelon is able to transform into different characters, and using additional mods and saves, it turns out to be a cool game.Peculiarities:Has red bloodWhen he dies, his eyes grow dim;The first living fruit in the game;More than 90% of players use this character as the main one;If the head is damaged, it dies.

content2.text: Apple is the fourth playable character in the game. It has a pronounced red color and a heart (can be checked with a special heartbeat tester).Unlike the main character, the apple's blood is yellow and looks like apple juice.A distinctive feature is the first doll that has an exact representation of a fruit in the form of a leaf on its head.If you kill an apple, then the leaf disappears, and the color of the eyes becomes dimmer.

Like other antagonists, the weak point is the head. When shot or hit by her, he dies.Peculiarities:Has yellow blood;Able to blink;The body is two colored;A little higher than Melon;There are many mods created in his image;In standard things there is an item of the same name (corn);If you set fire to corn, popcorn will come out of it.

content3.text: This mod adds one of the creatures of the People Playground game to the game, namely a person. Pros:
The author did his best to transfer a person from the people playground to the melon playground. Your insides Your skeleton Cons: and minuses mark in the comments ðŸ˜‰ Author: Ywymem

content4.text: Peculiarities: Changed blood color Changed skeleton Changed a little flesh Can be killed Can be set on fire Nightmare is in the Living tab Author â€” @D3STROY3Rx t.me/fanmelonplayground

content5.text: A survival horror game inspired by Bioshock, Dark Meadow: The Pact has a post-apocalyptic setting with a surprising fairy-tale twist. You will be fighting bloodthirsty goblins roaming the dilapidated halls of an abandoned hospital, seeking the warm blood of the living. More fear strikes as you encounter a witch, and eliminating her is the only way to escape the hospital.

A touch-centric game, The Pact has gesture-based controls that allow gamers to use common finger gestures while operating a crossbow or a sword. The controls are easy to master and quite fun. The stunning visuals, provided by Unreal's Game Engine 3, are an unmatched visual feast.

Dark Meadow is an exploration-based game and has some scary surprises in store. While exploring the haunted hospital, you will uncover several , puzzles, and weapons. You can use in-game money to buy items and equipment that will help you survive the goblin onslaught. With amazing visuals, deep storyline, and excellent gameplay, this survival horror game is here to give you the creeps.
